gallery.description: Bringing smiles and good health — AIM Foundation’s Paediatric Health Camp in Rambagan, Kolkata, caring for the children of sex workers with love, compassion, and hope for a healthier future.

gallery.alt: Community health camp in a village
gallery.description: Extending healthcare to the last mile — AIM Foundation’s free medical camp at Jharkhali Island, Sundarbans, bringing essential check-ups and care to the remote communities of South 24 Parganas.

gallery.alt: Distribution of Spectacles to underprivileged community
gallery.description: Clear vision for a brighter future — AIM Foundation’s spectacle distribution drive for underprivileged communities in Kolkata, bringing the gift of sight and hope to those in need.
Empowering young minds through education — AIM Foundation’s book distribution drive inspiring children to dream, learn, and grow.

gallery.alt: Community health camp in a village
gallery.description: Delivering healthcare with compassion — AIM Foundation’s free medical camp at Bali Island, Sundarbans, reaching the underserved communities of South 24 Parganas with care and hope.
Supporting the future of the most marginalized — AIM Foundation’s initiative to uplift children from the Sabar community, nurturing hope, education, and opportunity in West Bengal.
Protecting nature, preserving life — AIM Foundation’s TideShield initiative restores the Sundarbans ecosystem with mangrove plantations, safeguarding our environment for generations to come.
Stitching independence and confidence — AIM Foundation’s Project SuiDhaga empowers women with vocational skills, turning talent into livelihood and dreams into reality

gallery.alt: An elderly person getting an eye check-up
gallery.description: Bringing clarity and confidence — AIM Foundation’s SightHope program restores vision and hope, helping communities see a brighter future.

gallery.alt: Volunteers distributing relief kits during a flood
gallery.description: Standing together in times of crisis — AIM Foundation provides immediate relief and support to families affected by floods, restoring hope and strength.

gallery.alt: Children participating in an art workshop
gallery.description: Inspiring joy and imagination — AIM Foundation’s Innocent Smiles program nurtures creativity and confidence in every child, one smile at a time.

gallery.alt: A group of women in a cervical cancer awareness camp
gallery.description: Promoting health and prevention — AIM Foundation’s Cervical Cancer Awareness Camp empowers underprivileged women with knowledge and early detection for a healthier future.

gallery.alt: Community members at an environmental awareness session
gallery.description: Planting seeds for a sustainable future — AIM Foundation’s Roots of Change initiative raises environmental awareness while nurturing care for our planet.
Caring for the community — AIM Foundation’s free health camp at Sarala Punyashram, Kolkata, providing check-ups and medicines to those in need.

gallery.alt: A group of volunteers posing together
gallery.description: United in service — AIM Foundation volunteers join hands to make a positive impact at a community event.

gallery.alt: A nutritious health drink being served
gallery.description: Fighting malnutrition one sip at a time — AIM Foundation provides nutritious health drinks during class hours to nurture healthy and strong children.

gallery.alt: A woman proudly displaying her handcrafted goods
gallery.description: Celebrating talent and independence — AIM Foundation supports women in honing their craft, turning skills into empowerment and livelihoods.
Preserving nature, protecting wildlife — AIM Foundation leads the cleanup drive at Garumara National Park, Jalpaiguri, fostering a cleaner and greener environment.
Bridging the digital divide — AIM Foundation’s Digital Literacy class at Rangakhila forest village, Purba Bardhaman, empowers communities with essential digital skills.

gallery.alt: Interaction with the students of Modern High School with the underprivileged students of AIM Foundation
gallery.description: Building connections, sharing smiles — Students of Modern High School for Girls, Kolkata, engage with underprivileged children of AIM Foundation, fostering learning, friendship, and hope.
Bringing healthcare to remote communities — AIM Foundation’s medical camp at Kalidaspur, Sundarbans, provides essential check-ups and care to those in need.

gallery.alt: Health Camp for the children of sex workers
gallery.description: Caring for every child — AIM Foundation’s health camp in Sonagachi, Kolkata, provides essential medical care to the children of sex workers, nurturing health and hope.
Empowering education through technology — AIM Foundation’s Smart Classroom initiative brings modern learning tools to students in remote villages, opening doors to a brighter future.
Inspiring young minds — AIM Foundation’s seminar on National Youth Day highlights Swami Vivekananda’s vision of education, igniting purpose, knowledge, and leadership in the youth.
Early detection saves lives — AIM Foundation, in association with Narayana Health, conducts an Oral Cancer Detection Camp to raise awareness and provide timely medical care.
Spreading warmth and care — AIM Foundation distributes blankets to footpath dwellers in Kolkata, offering comfort and support during cold nights.

gallery.alt: Art class for the underpriviledged children
gallery.description: Unleashing creativity — AIM Foundation’s art class at Kasba, Kolkata, inspires underprivileged children to express themselves and explore their imagination.
Empowering young girls with knowledge — AIM Foundation’s Menstrual Hygiene Awareness Camp promotes health, confidence, and dignity among adolescent girls.
Bridging the digital divide — AIM Foundation’s Digital Literacy class at Dakshin Dhupjhora, Jalpaiguri, empowers communities with essential technology skills.

gallery.alt: Mangrove Plantation in Bali Island Sundarbans, 24 Parganas (S)
gallery.description: Strengthening nature’s shield — AIM Foundation’s mangrove plantation drive at Bali Island, Sundarbans, 24 Parganas (S), helps restore the ecosystem and protect coastal communities.
Promoting wellness together — AIM Foundation, in association with Neotia Bhagirathi Women and Childcare Institute, conducts a health camp in Kolkata, providing essential care to the community.

gallery.alt: Kolkata Studio for for online english classes
gallery.description: Connecting learning beyond boundaries — AIM Foundation’s Kolkata studio enables online English classes, bringing quality education to children in remote villages.

gallery.alt: Blanket Distribution to adivasi community of West Medinipur
gallery.description: Spreading warmth and care — AIM Foundation, supported by Moothut Finance, distributes blankets to the Adivasi community of West Medinipur, bringing comfort during the cold season.

gallery.alt: Garment Distribution to fire victims at Topsia, Kolkata
gallery.description: Extending a helping hand — AIM Foundation provides garments to fire-affected families in Topsia, Kolkata, offering relief and support in times of need.
Spreading wisdom and inspiration — AIM Foundation shares the teachings of Swami Vivekananda with rural communities in Purulia, fostering knowledge, courage, and hope.
Promoting health and well-being — AIM Foundation’s medical camp in Kolkata provides essential check-ups and care to the community.

gallery.alt: Healthcare camp for the children of Kolkata
gallery.description: Caring for young lives — AIM Foundation’s free health camp in Kolkata ensures children receive essential medical check-ups and support for a healthier future.
Promoting health and dignity — AIM Foundation’s Menstrual Hygiene Awareness Camp educates and empowers women and girls with essential knowledge and care.
Early detection saves lives — AIM Foundation conducts Cervical Cancer Screening at Domjur, Howrah, empowering women with health awareness and timely care.
